[fade_deliveryorderaddress.jss]

<script src="typo3conf/ext/browser/res/js/jquery/jquery-1.8.3.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">

  /**
   *
   * Copyright (c) 2013 Dirk Wildt
   * http://wildt.at.die-netzmacher.de/
   *

   * Version 0.0.3
   *
   * Slider for delivery address
   */



  $( document ).ready( function( )
  {
      // HTML unique class of the fieldset delivery address
    var fieldset_delivery_address  = ".###POWERMAIL_FIELDSET_DELIVERYORDER_ADDRESS###";

      // RETURN there isn't any HTML element with the defined class
    if( ! $( fieldset_delivery_address ).length )
    {
      return;
    }

      // Hide all fields (divs) of the fieldset delivery address
    $( fieldset_delivery_address ).children( 'div' )
      .slideUp( 'fast' );
    var bool_visible = false;

      // Display the legend of the fieldset delivery address
    $( fieldset_delivery_address ).children( 'legend' )
      .css( "visibility", "visible" )
      .css( "cursor", "pointer" )
      .slideDown( 'fast' );

      // Method for toogle the display of the delivery address
      // The user has clicked on the legend
    $( fieldset_delivery_address ).children( 'legend' ).bind(
      'click',
      function( e )
      {
          // delivery address is visible
        if( bool_visible )
        {
            // Hide all fields (divs) of the fieldset delivery address
          $( fieldset_delivery_address ).children( 'div' )
            .slideUp( 'fast' );
        }
          // delivery address is visible
          // delivery address is hidden
        else
        {
            // Display all fields (divs) of the fieldset delivery address
          $( fieldset_delivery_address ).children( 'div' )
            .slideDown( 'fast' );
        }
          // delivery address is hidden
        bool_visible = ! bool_visible;
      }
    );
      // The user has clicked on the legend
      // Method for toogle the display of the delivery address

  });

</script>
Delivery

Please clarify your delivery conditions like

  • within your country
  • to islands of your country
  • within Europe
  • world wide
Power of Revocation

Your right of revocation

Good to know

  • If you don't inform your customer about the power of revocation, you can get trouble with lawyers.

Helpful links

  • German right of revocation and right of return in distance contracts translated to English
  • BGB § 312d - Widerrufs- und Rückgaberecht bei Fernabsatzverträgen
  • German ebay template of a Widerrufsbelehrung
Terms and conditions

We don't have any terms and conditions, because this is a shop for demonstration only.

  • The shop demonstrates the workflow of Organiser.
  • The ordered items aren't available.
  • Invoice and delivery order are for demonstration only.
  • You don't need to pay the invoice of course.

If you are satisfied by Organiser and if you like to subsidise the project, please visit:

  • Subsidise Organiser! »

barack.obama_timestamp.jpg
Barack O.
Barack Obama: US President

Barack H. Obama is the 44th President of the United States. His story is the American story - values from the heartland, a middle-class upbringing in a strong family, hard work and education as the means of getting ahead, and the conviction that a life so blessed should be lived in service to others. With a father from Kenya and a mother from Kansas, President Obama was born in Hawaii on August 4, 1961. He was raised with help from his grandfather, who served in Patton's army, and his grandmother, who worked her way up from the secretarial pool to middle management at a bank. After working his way through college with the help of scholarships and student loans, President Obama moved to Chicago, where he worked with a group of churches to help rebuild communities devastated by the closure of local steel plants. He went on to attend law school, where he became the first African-American president of the Harvard Law Review. Upon graduation, he returned to Chicago to help lead a voter registration drive, teach constitutional law at the University of Chicago, and remain active in his community. President Obama's years of public service are based around his unwavering belief in the ability to unite people around a politics of purpose. In the Illinois State Senate, he passed the first major ethics reform in 25 years, cut taxes for working families, and expanded health care for children and their parents. As a United States Senator, he reached across the aisle to pass groundbreaking lobbying reform, lock up the world's most dangerous weapons, and bring transparency to government by putting federal spending online. He was elected the 44th President of the United States on November 4, 2008, and sworn in on January 20, 2009. He and his wife, Michelle, are the proud parents of two daughters, Malia, 12, and Sasha, 9.

TYPO3 Developer Days

We invite you to this year's Developer Days. This will be a great time to learn more about the powerful system and is your chance to connect yourself with other developers from all around the world. Conference Activities
  • Workshops and presentations on a variety of TYPO3 topics
  • Ability to meet the TYPO3 community

Topic
  • First night: Organiser - TYPO3 for organisers and the lobby (Dirk Wildt)
The developer - Dirk Wildt (Die Netzmacher) - will present the TYPO3 Organiser in the public the first time. The will be sopme sample applications and references. The Organiser enables you, to manage news and events with selling online tickets and further on to manage your staff, headquarters and locations. The Organiser is the TYPO3 extension for organisers like theatres and the lobby. It is using the shopping cart Caddy.

CD: TYPO3-Party - Release 1.0
TYPO3 1: Der Gründer-Groove

Auf dieser CD hörst Du den Sound der Geschichte. Die Aufnahmen stammen fast ausschließlich von der Party zum Release von TYPO3 1.0. Nicht nur die Band sondern auch das damalige TYPO3-Core-Entwickler-Team passten in ein kleinen Bus. Das Cover zeigt den Bus kurz vor der Abreise nach Norwegen - damals wurde Casper noch mit dem Auto persönlich abgeholt. Der Kleinbus verfügte nur über ein Kasetten-Abspiel-Gerät. Das ging nach 1.500 Kilometern kurz hinter Oslo kaputt.
Der Sound der Geschichte - schon fast vergessen: die Party zum Release von TYPO3 1.0. Caspar kam aus Norwegen mit dem Auto. Die Aufnahmen von damals halten die Erinnerungen wach.
cd_typo3_music_1_timestamp.jpg

CD: Aus dem Leoparden-Gummistiefel
TYPO3 4: Der Klang des Hier-und-Jetzt

Wenn Du wissen willst, wie sich die Entwicklung von TYPO3 4 anhört, dann zieh' Dir die Musik-Sammlung und Sounds dieser CD 'rein. Projektleiter Ernesto Baschny hat dabei das Mikro nicht nur an klackernde Tastaturen, surrende Festplatten und rauschende Lüfter seiner Team-Mitglieder gehalten, sondern sogar in manchen Schuh. Einer der geilsten Höhepunkte ist der Mitschnitt aus dem Innenleben eines Leoparden-Gummistiefels. Das Stiefel-Paar hat es dann auch auf das Cover geschafft und ist dort abgebildet - samt TYPO3-Entwicklerin Aura.
Das aktuelle TYPO3 4 funktioniert nicht nur, sondern hört sich auch heiß an. Eine der verschwitztesten Aufnahmen: aus dem Inneren eines Leoparden-Gummistiefels einer TYPO3-Entwicklerin.

CD: TYPO3 Fluid - Wassermusik
TYPO3 5: Ich möcht' Blasen blubbern lassen

Das TYPO3 der Zukunft wird flüssig. Dafür sorgt die neue Template-Engine fluid. Dann hört sich TYPO3 total anders an - nämlich wie unter Wasser. Bei einer der letzten Sessions der TYPO3-5-Band guckte dann auch Nina Hagen vorbei und sang ihren Song, "... ich möcht' ein Fisch im Wasser sein, ... und paar Blasen blubbern lassen ...". Patrick Lobacher hat Ninas Einlage, spontan begleitet von Kontrabass und Fagott, mitgeschnitten. Viele neue TYPO3-Titel sind auf der CD. Natürlich ziert Nina das Cover. Die CD muss noch gepresst werden und ist voraussichtlich ab Ende 2012 lieferbar.
Das neue TYPO3 wird mit Fluid noch flüssiger. Grund für Nina Hagen, die Grand-Dame des Punk, vor der TYPO3-5-Band ihr Fisch-Lied neu zu interpretieren. Ab Ende 2012 lieferbar.

Das Lern-Tutorial: Deine eigene Datenbank in drei Stunden

Das Tutorial zeigt am Beispiel von Grüne Autos Schritt für Schritt, wie TYPO3-Entwickler komplexe Datenbanken in nur drei Stunden selbst programmieren können. Grüne Autos basiert auf dem Browser - TYPO3 ohne PHP. Der Browser ermöglicht die Entwicklung von TYPO3-Erweiterungen ohne eine einzige Zeile PHP. Der Aufwand für Entwickler reduziert sich auf bis zu ein Achtel, die Enwicklung geht bis zu acht Mal schneller.
Das Tutorial zeigt Schritt für Schritt, wie Du mit TYPO3 eine eigene Datenbank in nur drei Stunden selbst programmieren kannst.

Get into the TYPO3 FLOW!

Discover FLOW3 with our Getting Started Tutorial. Just follow the step-by-step instructions for building your first FLOW3 application and learn new programming paradigms and patterns along the way. Get started with FLOW3

About FLOW3

It can change the way you work. It gives you fast results. It is a reliable foundation for complex applications. And it is backed by one of the biggest PHP communities. We created FLOW3 as the foundation for the upcoming major version of TYPO3 (code name Phoenix). Now you can use our framework too, to build your own applications where code libraries lack an overall concept or a CMS would not fit the bill. FLOW3 brings new concepts to the PHP world. Domain-Driven Design, Dependency Injection and Aspect-Oriented Programming are some of them. And besides some great features we offer a new view on the "how" of software development. It's about efficiency. It's about the beauty of code. And it's a lot of fun.

Health Reform
A Phone Call from the President

Posted by Kalpen Modi on March 22, 2011 at 04:00 PM EDT One year ago tomorrow, President Obama signed the Affordable Care Act into law. It was a historic day, and the law is already making a difference in the lives of millions of Americans like Erick Moberg. Erick is currently a senior at Michigan State University and his dream is to attend medical school at his grandfather's alma mater in Missouri. Erick was always interested in medicine, but he was inspired after speaking to the doctors who treated his mother when she had quadruple bypass surgery. After he graduates this spring, Erick will be taking a year to enhance his skills and prepare his application. Under the old insurance rules, he would have been forced off his parent's health insurance plan. But now, thanks to the Affordable Care Act, Erick will be able to stay on his mother's plan. We interviewed Erick, and as he told his story, he received a surprise phone call from President Obama. Erick is just one example of the millions of Americans who are being helped by the new law. After just one year, Americans are enjoying: New coverage options
  • Children with pre-existing conditions cannot be denied coverage in new health plans.
  • Adults who have been locked out of the insurance marketplace because of a pre-existing condition can now buy coverage through a new Pre-Existing Condition Plan.
Better quality coverage
  • People with insurance are free from worrying about losing their insurance due to a mistake on an application, or having it capped unexpectedly if someone is in an accident or becomes sick.
  • All Americans in new insurance plans will receive preventive services without being charged a deductible, co-payment, or co-insurance.
Lower Costs
  • Seniors have the freedom to get the care they need, including free preventive care, lower cost prescription drugs, and Medicare they can count on. Nearly 4 million Americans who hit the Medicare prescription drug coverage gap known as the "donut hole" received $250 tax-free rebates, and will receive a 50% discount on brand name prescription drugs if they hit the donut hole this year.
  • Up to 4 million small businesses could receive tax credits to make employees' health coverage more affordable.
  • Insurance companies can no longer overcharge consumers just to boost profits and CEO salaries.
Visit http://www.HealthCare.gov to learn more about the new law and the work we're doing to deliver the benefits of reform to the American people. For step-by-step instructions on the young adult coverage provision that helped Erick, you can also visit www.facebook.com/YoungAdultCoverage. Note: you also can visit our 50 States, 50 Stories map to listen to more stories of people the law has helped. Kalpen Modi is Associate Director of the White House Office of Public Engagement

<script src="typo3conf/ext/browser/res/js/jquery/jquery-1.8.3.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">

  /**
   *
   * Copyright (c) 2013 Dirk Wildt
   * http://wildt.at.die-netzmacher.de/
   *

   * Version 0.0.3
   *
   * Slider for delivery address
   */



  $( document ).ready( function( )
  {
      // HTML unique class of the fieldset delivery address
    var fieldset_delivery_address  = ".###POWERMAIL_FIELDSET_DELIVERYORDER_ADDRESS###";

      // RETURN there isn't any HTML element with the defined class
    if( ! $( fieldset_delivery_address ).length )
    {
      return;
    }

      // Hide all fields (divs) of the fieldset delivery address
    $( fieldset_delivery_address ).children( 'div' )
      .slideUp( 'fast' );
    var bool_visible = false;

      // Display the legend of the fieldset delivery address
    $( fieldset_delivery_address ).children( 'legend' )
      .css( "visibility", "visible" )
      .css( "cursor", "pointer" )
      .slideDown( 'fast' );

      // Method for toogle the display of the delivery address
      // The user has clicked on the legend
    $( fieldset_delivery_address ).children( 'legend' ).bind(
      'click',
      function( e )
      {
          // delivery address is visible
        if( bool_visible )
        {
            // Hide all fields (divs) of the fieldset delivery address
          $( fieldset_delivery_address ).children( 'div' )
            .slideUp( 'fast' );
        }
          // delivery address is visible
          // delivery address is hidden
        else
        {
            // Display all fields (divs) of the fieldset delivery address
          $( fieldset_delivery_address ).children( 'div' )
            .slideDown( 'fast' );
        }
          // delivery address is hidden
        bool_visible = ! bool_visible;
      }
    );
      // The user has clicked on the legend
      // Method for toogle the display of the delivery address

  });

</script>

calurl
White House: Ostereier-Party
http://www.whitehouse.gov/eastereggroll

Der Präsident und die First Lady haben heute angekündigt, dass das nächste White House Ostereier-Rollen am kommenden 1. April stattfinden wird. Das Thema ist "Steh auf und geh los!". Mit der Party soll für mehr Gesundheit und Wohlbefinden geworben werden.
TYPO3 Developer Days

Wir laden Dich zu den kommenden TYPO3 Developer Days ein. Die Days sind eine großartige Möglichkeit, mehr über das leistungsfähige TYPO3 zu lernen. Sie sind Deine Chance, andere Entwickler aus der ganzen Welt kennenzulernen.
Konferenz-Aktivitäten
  • Workshops und Präsentationen zu verschiedenen TYPO3-Themen
  • Möglichkeiten, die TYPO3-Community kennenzulernen
  • Social Event (kostenlos für Konferenzteilnehmer, individuelle Tickets für andere)
  • Wie jedes Jahr ein paar Überraschungen :-)
Die TYPO3 Developer Days finden statt:
t3dd11_header_front_timestamp.jpg
http://t3dd11.typo3.org/
Premiere: TYPO3 Organiser

Thema
  • Premiere: Organiser - TYPO3 für Lobby und Veranstalter (Dirk Wildt)
Der Entwickler - Dirk Wildt (Die Netzmacher) - stellt erstmals den TYPO3-Organiser in der Öffentlichkeit vor. Er wird Anwendungsbeispiele mit mehrere Referenzseiten zeigen. Mit dem Organiser kannst Du Deine Nachrichten und Veranstaltungen mit Ticket-Verkauf mit einer einzigen TYPO3-Erweiterung verwalten - und darüber hinaus auch Dein Personal, deine Standorte und Veranstaltungsorte. Der Organiser ist die TYPO3-Erweiterung für Verbände, Veranstalter und etwa Theater-Betriebe. Der Organiser hat mit Caddy einen flexiblen Web-Shop integriert, mit dem Karten reserviert und auch gekauft werden können. Er kann leicht an andere Anforderungen angepasst werden.
  • Website: typo3-organiser.de
P.S.: Barack Obama hat als Gast zugesagt. ACHTUNG: Kurzfristige Absagen des Präsidenten sind nicht ungewöhnlich!
